review: OMG!!! Wow!! Amazing little tool!! I plugged my Fire Stick into my Samsung BluRay HDMI port and it works flawlessly. Thanks Amazon!!
author: Jay Jones

review: Constant wireless internet problems. Need to return it
author: Mr. T

review: Sadly, Showtime Anytime is not supported for DirecTV customers. No Starz Play and no HBO Go. Works great for the apps it does have.
author: C. Gehlker

review: I received this before Christmas - hooked up and nothing...  It displayed "Amazon" momentary  then blank.  Subsequent hookups/power up/down did not display anything.  Tried on another TV too.  Maybe some quality control is in order.  Garbage...
author: Big nerd

review: Very easy set up, was online in just couple of minutes. Love the movies, tv series and specially the music playlist. Meet and exceed my expectations too.
author: Natalie Martinez "technicagirl"

review: oh my! what a deal! except i thought Netflix was included with the deal.
author: CATHOU
